billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Requires that appointment of members of New York city water board be appointed by mayor with advice and consent of city council and not be an employee of such city
summary: Requires that appointment of members of the New York city water board be made by the mayor with the advice and consent of the city council; provides that such a member shall not be an employee of such city.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to members of the New York city water board and the manner of their appointment
